PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^1Make sure you change the budget on the TREE, SKILLS AND GEAR when looking at the different budgets.
^4For Medium/High Budget: Stygian Vise =/= Darkness Enthroned, depends on what's easier to sort chaos resistances & dexterity requirements. Phase Run & Dash can be lower lvls to help mitigate the attribute starvation.

Skill.label: ^6Main DMG (cold or lightning depends on colors)

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^1=== CAP ELE RES w/ GEAR === +100% to all elemental resistances +100% to chaos resistance
^4=== AG === Gear: Leer Cast Dying Breath Gravebind Inpulsa Rare boots w/ Chaos res, life & life regen ^5Stats: Nearby allies deal 68% increased damage 18% increased effect of your curses
